Summary: Pill Shaped Dull Glowing Object at Sea
divs: Sighting DetailsOur ship, the Carnival Glory had left Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada and was on its way back to New York, City. We had just finished dinner and went to our cabin which had a balcony on the starboard side of the ship on deck 9. I went out onto the balcony to have a smoke and it was pretty stormy. Couldn't see any other objects except the sea and the misty dark sky. All of a sudden a well defined pill shaped object with a dull glow went in a perfectly straight line from the front of the ship to the back. When it reached the back it took a sudden turn downward and I thought it was going to go into the sea but instead it curved around the back of the ship. This only took about 10 seconds from start to finish. I couldn't believe what I saw and debated whether or not I should report it. I stayed out on the balcony for about twenty more minutes hoping it would return but it never did. I told my wife but did not report it to the ships crew because I thought they would think I was some kind of a nut. I currently live in Las Vegas just 90 miles from Area 51 and I have never seen anything like this before. I want to be clear that it didn't look metallic. It was closer to being some kind of dull light or energy but shaped like a pill with crisp edges. I am a web designer and self trained graphic artist and have done my best to recreate what I saw. I just wish someone else would have filed a report and I could have backed up their report.
